withlogo.name: FogTorchPI
withlogo.description: Tool for probabilistic QoS-assurance and resource consumption estimation of fog application deployments.

withlogo.name: DockerFinder
withlogo.description: Microservice-based tool for automatically searching for Docker images based on multiple attributes.

withlogo.name: TosKer
withlogo.description: Docker-based support for orchestrating multi-component applications specified in TOSCA.

withoutlogo.name: Barrel
withoutlogo.description: Support for designing the management of TOSCA applications.

withoutlogo.name: DrACO
withoutlogo.description: Discoverer of cloud offerings specified in TOSCA.

withoutlogo.name: PASA
withoutlogo.description: Probabilistic analyser of QoS in parallel applications.

withoutlogo.name: PASO
withoutlogo.description: Probabilistic analyser of QoS in service orchestrations.

withoutlogo.name: TosKeriser
withoutlogo.description: Completer of TOSCA applications that can run with TosKer.
